attributes.action: Healthy and tasty hospital food for patients and staff.
attributes.additional_details: How are patients supposed to begin any kind of recovery without healthy nutritious foods? Surely nutrients is one of the main priorities to recovery. I am a chef and have been in hospital for 5 days and cannot begin to eat this cheap, unappetising, unappealing, non nutritious food. It’s shameful
attributes.background: Introduce healthy, tasty food for all patients in hospital. Staring with the basics, fresh ingredients, herbs and spices

rejection.details:
The Government already sets minimum standards for the provision on patient food in hospitals. There has also been a recent review into hospital food, you can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-blueprint-for-better-hospital-food

If you believe that food received in hospital is inadequate, you could make a complaint: https://www.england.nhs.uk/contact-us/complaint/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
